text: General Prem Tinsulanonda (August 26, 1920 - May 26, 2019) was a Thai retired military officer. He was Prime Minister of Thailand from March 3, 1980 to August 4, 1988. He was the Regent of Thailand and the Head of the Privy Council. Tinsulanonda died on May 26, 2019 from heart failure at a Bangkok hospital at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== *General Prem Tinsulanonda Home Page *Prem Center for International Education *News article about his recent activity Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Prem Tinsulanonda Prem Tinsulanonda
title: Prem Tinsulanonda
